sections.heading: Continuances; liberally granted
sections.text: Continuances shall be liberally granted at the request of the subject. Continuances may be granted to permit the subject to obtain voluntary treatment at a private facility.SourceLaws 1976, LB 806, ยง 64;Laws 1985, LB 252, ยง 6;R.S.1943, (1999), ยง 83-1054;Laws 2004, LB
